Overview

HackerRank lets the recruiters hide the question title from candidates in a test. This feature prevents the candidate from searching the question online using its title to find answers.  

This option will replace the question title with a generic title such as Question 1, Question 2, etc. 

Hiding Question Title

  • To hide questions in your test, visit the test Settings page and select the Test Integrity option from the left pane. 
  • Scroll down to the Question Settings section, enable the Hide Question Title toggle, and save the changes. This switch is turned off by default.
  • The questions in a candidate’s test screen will be presented like this with a generic name after selecting the hiding question title option.
title: Hiding Question Title
